Description.Name: Objective Bonus Reputation Reward
Description.Details: Extra Employer reputation for completing a specific objective

temporalSetResult: Your Reputation with [[TEAM_EMP,{TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}]] is now {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalPositiveResult: You gain {RES_VALUE.ToString} Reputation with [[TEAM_EMP,{TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}]] for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalNegativeResult: You lose {RES_VALUE.ToString} Reputation with [[TEAM_EMP,{TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}]] for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
